About us
Mission
FusionFest Inc., 501(c)3 nonprofit organization, creates opportunities for cultural discovery, bringing awareness to the joy and power of diversity and inclusion by
showcasing talents, sharing stories, and innovatively building community based on respect and understanding.
FusionFest Inc. is governed by a multicultural Board of Directors and informed by international Steering Committee representing heritages from around the globe.
Vision
A Central Florida community in which all people feel seen, appreciated, and included.
Values
Inclusion
FusionFest
creates the warmest and widest invitation possible. In
all of
its forms, it is comfortable, safe, and
reflects the very best expression of “Welcome!” Inviting people IN is an important responsibility we take to heart every day
and in everything we undertake.
Celebration
FusionFest
exists to celebrate humanity at its best and honor the extraordinary vitality of our diversity in culture,
thinking, and playfulness.
Creativity
FusionFest
is a showcase for creativity. We know that giving voice, sight, sound and motion to new ideas in
evolving forms is at the heart of a vital community.
Courage
FusionFest
is committed to excellence and quality in all that we do. We are in the business of removing barriers
and enabling achievement and appreciation with energy, patience and steadfast commitment.
What We Do
We fulfill our mission by organizing
monthly and annual events
that keep the community engaged and connected to the cultural diversity of Central Florida.
FusionFest
Our signature and namesake event is a free, two-day outdoor festival in Downtown Orlando that showcases and celebrates more than 100 cultures and heritages through music, dance, visual arts, food, spoken word, fashion, crafts, children and family activities, and much more.
WHEN:
Saturday and Sunday after Thanksgiving Day.
Saturday 10am-8pm. Sunday Noon-6pm.
WHERE:
Seneff Arts Plaza, Dr. Phillips Center for the Performing Arts in Downtown Orlando.
WHAT WILL YOU FIND AT THE FESTIVAL:
Opening Spectacle & U.S. Citizenship Ceremony
International Food Court & Marketplace
Live music, dance, spoken word
Visual Art Gallery &
Cultural Displays
Field of Flags
Kids’ & Family Fun Village / Cardboard Global Village
Global Street Dance Party
Interactive Experiences & Art Classes
Cosplay and fashion
MYgration Films screenings
Country Meet-Up & Group Photos
Triple "O" Interactive Art Game
A fun-filled interactive game that immerses participants in artistic expression by going beyond traditional art appreciation—fostering curiosity, lively discussion, and cultural exchange.
Each month, a local FusionFest participating artist is spotlighted, representing the diverse cultures that make Central Florida a vibrant community.
Culinary Fusion Contest
5-7 Innovative, professional chefs create unique fusion dishes combining ingredients, techniques, or spices from at least two different continents/cultures, while competing for prize money!
You and a panel of judges sample all the creations.
The judges determine 1st and 2nd place winners each night.
YOU vote on the Audience Choice award winner each night.
Enjoy live entertainment, trivia, and making new friends!
Community Engagement
We participate in parades and create dining experiences and workshops from January to November.
Follow & Join Us!
HASHTAGS:
#FusionFest #FusionFestOrlando #ICanBeMeHere #ProudToShowMyColors

:

&
Instagram.com/FusionFestOrlando
Our Story
It all began when
Guenet & Sam Roberts
of the Caribbean American Passport and
Yves Bouele
of the African Leaders Council approached
Terry Olson
about creating some kind of international event. While there are dozens of festivals centered around one heritage or another in our community, we thought, What if we all came together at the same time?
In November of 2016, about 40 people from various heritages, including co-founder
Thali Sugisawa
, gathered to brainstorm the best way to share our heritages. In the following month, a
Steering Committee
began to take shape and has been meeting monthly ever since.
Some of the early stepping stones to the festival were bimonthly “Gathering of Nations” events with a few people from every heritage we could find in Central Florida (currently we have more than 140 heritages identified). Each of the Gatherings was focused on a particular aspect of culture – Food, Dance, Music, Clothing, Games, Literature. These explorations helped us envision what a “fusion” festival would look like – a place where we honored our heritages while celebrating how we influence each other as we shape our own unique identity as Central Floridians.
Awards & Accolades
Award of Excellence, 2019 Golden Brick Awards, Orlando Economic Partnership
Community Outreach Program, 2020 SunSational Awards, Florida Festivals and Events Association
Best Sponsor Partnership, Promotional Mailer and Instagram, 2021 SunSational Awards, Florida Festivals and Events Association
Arts, Culture and Historic Preservation, 2021 National Association of Counties (NACO) Achievement Awards
Arts Category Award, 2021 Golden Brick Awards, Orlando Economic Partnership
1st Place - Community Outreach Program, 2024 SunSational Awards, Florida Festivals and Events Association
2nd Place - Children's Programming, 2024 SunSational Awards, Florida Festivals and Events Association
2nd Place- Diversity, Equity & Inclusion Initiative 2024 SunSational Awards by the Florida Festivals and Events Association

Meet the Steering Committee
The Steering Committee is responsible for helping shape and grow FusionFest by contributing with ideas and serving as an ambassador within their circle and community. Meetings happen every 2nd Friday of the month via Zoom from 11:30 a.m. to 12:30 p.m.
